markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ru-Shi](/Feats.aspx?ID=2346) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 26 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You were born to a jiang-shi, one of the so-called hopping vampires found most often in Tian-Xia. Your parent had a supernatural obsession with counting small objects, which manifests in you as a preternatural gift for linguistics and mathematics. You are trained in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) and gain the [Eye for Numbers](/Feats.aspx?ID=2127) skill feat. If you would automatically become trained in Society (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

<title level="2">Ru-Shi leads to...</title>
[Hopping Stride](/Feats.aspx?ID=2348)
name: Ru-Shi
